artist: Artist: Attributed to Jean Louis André Théodore Géricault
creditline: Gift of Peter Pflaum and Stephen R. Pflaum
description: page of sketches; ULQ: two horses wearing blinders and yokes; URC: rearing horse with a nude figures lying face up across horse's back; bottom right: lion devouring a horse

provenance: (Goldschmidt Galleries, New York); sold to MIA, 1969.
title: Studies for "Cheval Devoré," "Mazeppa," and "Les Boueux"
